2013_07_life_dcfc.name: Allez Le Rouge
2013_07_life_dcfc.sub: The Detroit City Football Club finally gives devoted soccer fans a home team to support. And they’re giving the team all they’ve got.

2013_07_femme_lips.name: Bright Lips
2013_07_femme_lips.sub: We gathered up four of our neon hues that will look smoking haute on all of you beauties.

2013_07_femme_concerts.name: Face the Music
2013_07_femme_concerts.sub: Beat the heat and keep your style in check all concert season long.

2013_07_homme_suits.name: The Summer Suit
2013_07_homme_suits.sub: One suit. Four ways to wear it (and stay cool).
